embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out. The PBE currently still down for maintenance. ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

Someone here has a brain, lmfao. Thank you bless.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xI90FzcU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-26T22:41:59.117+0000)
>
> it stands for negative urf.

I think it is just supposed o be a play on the word nerf

> [{quoted}](name=Dalekvercity,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xI90FzcU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-26T22:47:13.628+0000)
>
> I think it is just supposed o be a play on the word nerf

it's obviously for URF coming on april 1st. and instead of increasing good things and decreasing bad things, it's increasing bad things, decreasing good things. ie, negative urf, or nurf. It is a play on the word nerf, but it's also the opposite of the first urf buff.
I think it's a fun twist on the classic URF we know and love. Wont know until we get to play though.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xI90FzcU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-27T01:50:13.572+0000)
>
> I think it's a fun twist on the classic URF we know and love. Wont know until we get to play though.

Race to lane!!! 10 minutes later....
I bet they will release normal urf as the april fool

Maybe it's whoever gets the kills gets the buff....
GIVE THE SUPPORT KILLS!
